title: Police say juvenile shot himself in leg at Portland McDonald's
content:
PORTLAND, Ore. -- Police say a juvenile accidentally shot himself at a Southeast Portland McDonald's Sunday night.
Crews responded to a shooting at the fast food restaurant in the 9100 block of SE Powell Boulevard around 7 p.m.
The juvenile apparently shot himself, police say, and suffered non-life threatening injuries.
Anyone with information about gang and/or gun crimes in the City of Portland is encouraged to provide information to the Portland Police Bureau's Tactical Operations Division at 503-823-4106.
